Paragraph: LD2805220394 Algiers ENTV Television Network in Arabic 1200 GMT 28 May 94

"The Algerian Defense Ministry announced today that 27 people were killed and 65 injured in a bomb explosion in a suburb of Algiers yesterday. The explosion occurred in a marketplace in the suburb of El-Harrach. The Defense Ministry blamed the explosion on the Armed Islamic Group (GIA), which has been responsible for a series of terrorist attacks in Algeria over the past few years. The GIA has not yet claimed responsibility for the attack."
